General.Name: Yaprak Sut ve Besi Ciftlikleri Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Yaprak Süt ve Besi Çiftlikleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is involved in the animal husbandry business in Turkey. It breeds calf, heifers, and dairy animals, as well as provides health services. The company also operates milk production facilities. Yaprak Süt ve Besi Çiftlikleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1994 and is based in Atasehir, Turkey.
General.Address: Barbaros Mahallesi Ihlamur Bulvari No: 3, Atasehir, Turkey

1.Name: Mr. Mustafa Hamza Kandur
1.Title: Fin. & Financial Affairs Coordinator and Director
